ygData.subject: Re: Newbie question about guards.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... go to misty. as soon as you can go to misty...it s a low level paradise...not may folks, lots of critters, and hyper aggro guards...sure, sometimes the
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 10 Nov 1999, PHAEDRA WHITLOCK wrote:
> The Freeport guards protect people. Ive read in posts past that
> Erudites should leave home ASAP and go to Qeynos to start out. Sounds
> good to me.

go to misty. as soon as you can go to misty...it's a low level
paradise...not may folks, lots of critters, and hyper aggro guards...sure,
sometimes the guards are annoying, but when your hauling it back with
mooto on your tail you'll appreceate them.

Stannis Starslyder
Wizard of the Moon
Innoruuk
